amendment.description: Amendment sought to preserve the ability of the President to declare as national monuments those that provide for the "protection or conservation of historic or cultural resources related to American military history," regardless of their size.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-385 to preserve the ability of the President to declare as national monuments those that provide for the "protection or conservation of historic or cultural resources related to American military history," regardless of their size.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 223 (Roll no. 145).
